title: Kavya Rao
text:
Welcome to my website. This site serves as a repository of my professional research, personal reflections, and my résumé.
Formally, I hold degrees in Economics from the University of Hyderabad and Christ University. I currently work at NITI Aayog in the Economics and Finance Division.
Looking forward to collaborate across economic research, public policy, and applied analytics.

title: Trade Watch Quarterly FY25
text:
I co-developed the series of four reports for FY25. It aims to provide a concise snapshot of India’s trade trends for the respective quarter along with a brief analysis for every sector. This document particularly includes a select set of graphs that I found most insightful on India’s trade performance. It also includes the links to the full reports.
